sqlMap.select: SELECT q.USER_ID AS userId, p.MEM_ID AS memId, q.USER_NAME AS userName, q.MOBILE, t.ID, t.SEX, TO_CHAR(t.BIRTHDAY, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS birthday, t.ADDRESS, t.POSTAL_CODE AS postalCode, t.PROFESSION, t.EDUCATION, t.MARITAL_STATUS AS maritalStatus, TO_CHAR(t.WEDDING_DAY, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS weddingDay, t.MEM_POINTS_ID AS memPointsId FROM MALL.MALL_TB_USER q, MALL.MALL_TB_MEMBER p, (SELECT tt.ID, tt.MEM_ID, tt.SEX, tt.BIRTHDAY, tt.ADDRESS, tt.POSTAL_CODE, tt.PROFESSION, tt.EDUCATION, tt.MARITAL_STATUS, tt.WEDDING_DAY, tt.MEM_POINTS_ID FROM MALL.MALL_TB_MEMBER_INFO tt WHERE tt.STATE = 'U' ) t WHERE q.USER_ID = p.USER_ID AND p.MEM_ID = t.MEM_ID(+) AND q.STATE = 'U' AND p.STATE = 'U' AND p.MEM_ID = #memId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT MALL.MALL_SEQ_MEMBER_INFO.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO MALL.MALL_TB_MEMBER_INFO ( ID, MEM_ID, SEX, BIRTHDAY, ADDRESS, POSTAL_CODE, PROFESSION, EDUCATION, MARITAL_STATUS, WEDDING_DAY, STATE, CREATE_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER, MEM_POINTS_ID ) VALUES ( #id#, #memId#, #sex#, TO_DATE(#birthday#, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), #address#, #postalCode#, #profession#, #education#, #maritalStatus#, TO_DATE(#weddingDay#, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), 'U', sysdate, sysdate, #memId#, #memPointsId# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE MALL.MALL_TB_MEMBER_INFO t SET t.modify_date = sysdate, t.modify_user = #memId#, t.SEX = #sex#, t.BIRTHDAY = to_date(#birthday#,'yyyy-mm-dd'), t.ADDRESS = #address#, t.POSTAL_CODE = #postalCode#, t.PROFESSION = #profession#, t.EDUCATION = #education#, t.MARITAL_STATUS = #maritalStatus#, t.WEDDING_DAY = to_date(#weddingDay#,'yyyy-mm-dd'), t.MEM_POINTS_ID = #memPointsId# WHERE t.state = 'U' AND t.id = #id#
